name: Autarky Habitat
desc:
Vast subterranean chambers supported by complex machinery. Included are hydroponic farm and custom nanoforge to ensure total survival as long as sufficient raw and refined material is procured.

This structure will protect the inhabitants from the effect of low light, darkness, cold and extreme cold and also provide easily defensible position. They however increase the isolation of the citizen, now uterly despondant and cut from most exterior communications.
